Posts.Content: Simply wrote: Just found out Friday that my biopsy was malignant. Have to wait until Monday to speak with surgeon. I know nothing else at this point. I found a little lump under my nipple. It came out of nowhere. Mammogram 3 months prior showed nothing. Not sure where to start.... Dx 9/6/2013, IDC, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 10/2/2013 Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: So scared... Simply msphil
